required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Epidemiology of In-hospital Acute Kidney Injury
clinical_study.official_title: Analysis of In-hospital Acute Kidney Injury Epidemiology, Treatment and Outcomes

brief_summary.textblock: Retrospective observational study to investigate acute kidney injury (AKI) epidemiology and outcomes in patients hospitalized in University Hospital San Martino, Genova, Italy.

detailed_description.textblock:
A retrospective observational study was designed to investigate acute kidney injury (AKI) epidemiology and outcome in patients hospitalized in University Hospital San Martino, Genova, Italy.
All data will be extracted from the hospital electronic database. The investigators will evaluate demographic, clinical and laboratory data, including age, sex, serum creatinine (sCr), sodium and electrolytes, intensive care unit (ICU) admission, length of hospital stay, death, comorbidities and primary diagnosis codes at the hospital discharge (using International Classification of Diseases-ICD-9- codes).
The investigators will include also patients affected by Coronavirus disease 19 (COVID-19).
The primary endpoint will be to describe AKI epidemiology, secondary endpoints will be to evaluate AKI-related risk factors and clinical outcomes, such as length of stay and mortality.
Moreover, the investigators will describe the differences in the outcome and treatments of AKI patients in the medical wards and ICU.

primary_outcome.description: Rate of in-hospital Acute Kidney Injury incidence
Staging of in-hospital Acute Kidney Injury according to the KDIGO guidelines

secondary_outcome.measure: Mortality in Acute Kidney Injury patients
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of in-hospital mortality among patients with Acute Kidney Injury
Data on kidney function after the discharge in Acute Kidney Injury patients

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients admitted to University Hospital San Martino, Genova, Italy
arm_group.description: Adult patients admitted to University Hospital San Martino, Genova, Italy

intervention.description: Collection and analysis of data related to AKI epidemiology, treatment and outcomes
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients admitted to University Hospital San Martino, Genova, Italy

study_pop.textblock: Adult patients admitted to Policlinico Universitario San Martino, Genova, Italy (including those with COVID-19).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients admitted to University Hospital San Martino, Italy
- We'll include also patients affected by Coronavirus disease 19 (COVID-19).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Hemodialysis patients
